description: This Python script demonstrates how a team manages agent memory within a collaborative AI system, including setup of agents, memory, team configuration, and execution of responses.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent with specific roles, models, tools, storage, and memory.

classes.name: SqliteMemoryDb
classes.description: SQLite database interface for storing memory data.

classes.name: Memory
classes.description: Handles memory management for agents, using specified models and database.

classes.name: Gemini
classes.description: Google Gemini model used for memory or agent purposes.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: OpenAI chat model used for agent interactions.

classes.name: SqliteAgentStorage
classes.description: SQLite storage backend for agent sessions.

classes.name: Team
classes.description: Represents a team of agents with shared memory and instructions.

methods.name: team.aprint_response
methods.description: Asynchronously prints the team's response to a prompt, with streaming options.

methods.name: memory.get_user_memories
methods.description: Retrieves memories associated with a specific user.

methods.name: print_team_memory
methods.description: Prints the memory contents of the team for a specific user.
